languages.text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.
languages.original_text:
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, архмилитант получает 1 уровень эффекта "универсальность". Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g} (одиночная или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}), атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел очередью.
Архмилитант получает +3 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою за каждый уровень эффекта "универсальность".
Если у архмилитанта накоплено 4 или более уровней этого эффекта, он наносит +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ББ)</u>% или +<u>(10 + бонус ДБ)</u>% урона дополнительно – используется значение, которое больше.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Veteran uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Veteran gains a stack of Right Tool for the Job. The types of attacks can be single shot, single melee attack, area melee attack, area shot, or burst shot. The Veteran gains +5 Weapon and Ballistic Skill for every stack of Right Tool for the Job. If the Veteran has 4 or more stacks of Right Tool for the Job, the Veteran deals an additional +(WS bonus / 2) or +(BS bonus / 2), whichever is highest, damage.

Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g}, area melee, area shot, or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

languages.text:
每当首席战士进行的攻击类型与上次攻击不同时，就会获得1层“多才多艺”效果。攻击类型包括{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}攻击（包括单次攻击与连续攻击）、范围近战攻击、范围射击、{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击。
每层“多才多艺”效果可以使首席战士的武器技能与弹道技能提高3点。
如果首席战士至少有4层“多才多艺”效果，则首席战士的攻击会造成额外伤害，等同于<u>（10+武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%或<u>（10+弹道技能加值）</u>%，以两者较高者为准。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

每层“多才多艺”效果可以使首席战士的武器技能与弹道技能提高3点。
如果首席战士至少有4层“多才多艺”效果，则首席战士的攻击会造成额外伤害，等同于<u>（10+武器技能{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%或<u>（10+弹道技能加值）</u>%，以两者较高者为准。

languages.text:
Cuando el Archimilitante usa un ataque de un tipo diferente a su ataque anterior, gana una acumulación de Versatilidad. Los tipos de ataque son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}disparo único{/g}, ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (único o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}), cuerpo a cuerpo de área, a distancia de área o de ráfaga de área.
El Archimilitante gana +3 de Habilidad de armas y de Habilidad de proyectiles por cada acumulación de Versatilidad.
Si el Archimilitante tiene 4 o más acumulaciones de Versatilidad, inflige daño adicional igual al +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por HA) </u> % o + <u>(10 + bonificación por HP)</u> % de daño, usando el valor más alto de los dos.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el Archimilitante usa un ataque de un tipo diferente a su ataque anterior, gana una acumulación de Versatilidad. Los tipos de ataque son: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}disparo único{/g}, ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} (único o de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}), cuerpo a cuerpo de área, a distancia de área o de ráfaga de área.
El Archimilitante gana +3 de Habilidad de armas y de Habilidad de proyectiles por cada acumulación de Versatilidad.
Si el Archimilitante tiene 4 o más acumulaciones de Versatilidad, inflige daño adicional igual al +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por HA) </u> % o + <u>(10 + bonificación por HP)</u> % de daño, usando el valor más alto de los dos.

languages.text:
アーク・ミリタントが前回の攻撃とは異なるタイプの攻撃を繰り出すたびに、汎用性のスタックを1つ獲得する。攻撃タイプには{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}（単体対象または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}）、範囲近接攻撃、範囲遠距離攻撃、遠距離バースト攻撃がある。
汎用性のスタック1つにつき、アーク・ミリタントのWSとBSが+3増加する。
汎用性を4スタック以上所有している場合、アーク・ミリタントが+<u>(10 + WS{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％または +<u>(10 + BSボーナス)</u>％のいずれか高い方の追加ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g} (одиночная или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}), атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел очередью.
Архмилитант получает +3 к Ближнему Бою и Дальнему Бою за каждый уровень эффекта "универсальность".
Если у архмилитанта накоплено 4 или более уровней этого эффекта, он наносит +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ББ)</u>% или +<u>(10 + бонус ДБ)</u>% урона дополнительно – используется значение, которое больше.

traits.locale_text:
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, ветеран получает 1 уровень эффекта "подходящий способ". Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночный выстрел{/g}, одиночная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g}, атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g}.
Ветеран получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта "подходящий способ".
Если у ветерана накоплено 4 или более уровней этого эффекта, он наносит +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ББ / 2)</u> или +<u>(бонус ДБ / 2)</u> урона дополнительно — используется значение, которое больше.

Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, ветеран получает 1 уровень эффекта "подходящий способ". Атаки бывают следующих типов: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночный выстрел{/g}, одиночная {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака вблизи{/g}, атака рукопашным оружием по области, выстрел по области и выстрел {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g}.
Ветеран получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} за каждый уровень эффекта "подходящий способ".
Если у ветерана накоплено 4 или более уровней этого эффекта, он наносит +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ББ / 2)</u> или +<u>(бонус ДБ / 2)</u> урона дополнительно — используется значение, которое больше.

languages.text:
Setzt der Erzmilitant einen Angriff ein, dessen Typ sich vom vorherigen unterscheidet, erhält er einen Stapel Vielseitigkeit. Gültige Angriffstypen sind: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} (Einzelziel oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g}), Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächen-Fernkampfangriff oder Salven-Fernkampfangriff.
Der Erzmilitant erhält +3 Waffenfähigkeit und Ballistik-Fähigkeit für jeden Vielseitigkeit-Stapel.
Hat der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel "Vielseitigkeit", verursacht er zusätzlich +<u>(10 + WF-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % oder +<u>(10 + BF-Bonus)</u> % Schaden (es gilt der höhere Wert).
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Erzmilitant einen Angriff einsetzt, der sich vom vorherigen unterscheidet, erlangt er einen Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job. Bei den Angriffsarten kann es sich um {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}, Einzel-{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, Flächen-Nahkampfangriff, Flächenschuss oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenschuss{/g} handeln.
Für jeden Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job erhält der Erzmilitant +5 Waffenfertigkeit und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.
Falls der Erzmilitant 4 oder mehr Stapel von Das richtige Werkzeug für den Job hat, erhält er zusätzlich +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> oder +<u>(BF-Bonus / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} (je nachdem, was höher ist).

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'archimilitant utilise une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente, il obtient un cumul de Polyvalence. Les types d'attaques valides sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone à distance ou attaque en rafale à distance.
Pour chaque cumul de Polyvalence, l'archimilitant gagne +3 à la Capacité de combat et à la Capacité de tir.
Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de Polyvalence, il inflige +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CC)</u> % ou +<u>(10 + bonus de CT)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires, selon la valeur la plus élevée.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'archimilitant utilise une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente, il obtient un cumul de Polyvalence. Les types d'attaques valides sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone à distance ou attaque en rafale à distance.
Pour chaque cumul de Polyvalence, l'archimilitant gagne +3 à la Capacité de combat et à la Capacité de tir.
Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de Polyvalence, il inflige +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CC)</u> % ou +<u>(10 + bonus de CT)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

Chaque fois que l'archimilitant utilise une attaque d'un type différent de celui de l'attaque précédente, il obtient un cumul de Polyvalence. Les types d'attaques valides sont les suivants : attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g}, attaque de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} (cible unique ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}), attaque de zone en mêlée, attaque de zone à distance ou attaque en rafale à distance.
Pour chaque cumul de Polyvalence, l'archimilitant gagne +3 à la Compétence d'arme et à la Compétence balistique.
Si le personnage possède au moins 4 cumuls de Polyvalence, il inflige +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de CA)</u> % ou +<u>(10 + bonus de CB)</u> % de dégâts supplémentaires, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

languages.text:
Başmilitan, ne zaman öncekinden farklı bir saldırı türü kullansa bir çok yönlülük birikimi kazanır. Geçerli saldırı türleri şunlardır: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Tek atış{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} saldırısı (tek hedefli veya {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g}), alan etkili yakın dövüş, alan etkili menzilli veya menzilli seri saldırı.
Başmilitan, her çok yönlülük birikimiyle +3 Silah Yeteneği ve Balistik Yetenek kazanır.
Başmilitan, 4 veya daha fazla çok yönlülük birikimine sahipse +%<u>(10 × SİY {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> veya +%<u>(10 × BAY bonusu)</u> kadar ilave hasar verir. Yüksek olan değer kullanılır.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the Arch-Militant uses an attack that is of a different type from their previous attack, the Arch-Militant gains a stack of versatility. Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.
The Arch-Militant gains +3 Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill for every stack of versatility.
If the Arch-Militant has 4 or more stacks of versatility, the Arch-Militant deals an additional +<u>(10 + WS {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% or +<u>(10 + BS bonus)</u>% damage, whichever is highest.
